### Research Interests


<p> I am interested in the development and application of Bayesian Nonparametric models, especially for clustering, analysis of time series and for the modeling of network data. My first research project, under the supervision of professors <a href='https://www.ics.uci.edu/~sudderth/' target="_blank">Erik Sudderth</a> and <a href='http://www.micheleguindani.info/' target="_blank">Michele Guindani</a>, is on a model for sparse network data with mixed community memberships.</p>

<p> In light of my varied background, I am enthusiastic about working with researchers in other fields. I have collaborated to academic research in the field of Behavioral Sciences and Earth Sciences and in the future I would love to contribute to projects in the fields of Anthropology, Economics and Sociology. </p>
